Body:
cron = doccron.cron('0 0 1W * 6 *')
datetime_1 = datetime.now(tz=tzlocal()).replace(hour=0, minute=0, second=0,
    microsecond=0)
if datetime_1.day == 1:
    datetime_1 += timedelta(days=monthrange(datetime_1.year, datetime_1.
        month)[-1])
while True:
    if datetime_1.day == 1 and datetime_1.isoweekday() == 6:
        break
    datetime_1 += timedelta(days=1)
assert next(cron) == datetime_1 + timedelta(days=2)
